subject: Marketing
title: Influencer Marketing Mechanics
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Influencer Marketing Mechanics.

hook.text: A YouTuber with 100,000 subscribers drives more sales than a TV ad reaching 10 million.

buildup.text: Influencer marketing works because recommendations from trusted people feel authentic.

discovery.text: Micro-influencers with smaller audiences often have higher engagement rates and trust.

twist.text: The biggest risk isn't reachâ€”it's misalignment between the influencer's audience and your product.

climax.text: Successful influencer partnerships feel like natural recommendations, not paid endorsements.

punchline.text: Trust transfers. Choose whose trust you borrow.

quiz.question: Why do micro-influencers often outperform larger influencers?
options: They have higher engagement rates and audience trust
They charge the highest fees in the industry
Social platforms give them algorithmic advantages
